Select_event_getAll:
SELECT A.id, A.name, A.description, A.start_date, A.end_date,
       A.location,   A.guest_capacity, A.category, A.created_at,
       A.updated_at
FROM event A
ORDER BY A.start_date
LIMIT ? OFFSET ?;
Count_event_getAll: SELECT COUNT(A.id) AS total FROM event A;
Insert_event:
INSERT INTO event (id, name, description, start_date, end_date,
                   location, guest_capacity, category, created_at)
VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
Update_event:
UPDATE event A
SET name=?, description=?, start_date=?, end_date=?,
    location=?, guest_capacity=?, category=?, updated_at=?
WHERE A.id = ?
Select_event_byId:
SELECT A.id, A.name, A.description, A.start_date, A.end_date,
       A.location,   A.guest_capacity, A.category, A.created_at,
       A.updated_at
FROM event A
WHERE A.id = ?
Delete_event: DELETE FROM event A WHERE A.id=?
